name: Golf of War
description:
KenneyJam 2019 (Unlikely Combinations)Get the ball to the hole. Shoot tanks. Don't die.

It's tanks meets golf in Golf of War. Featuring 5 levels, 3D gameplay, and next-gen ball handling.

Developed by myself and Orthyker, as we looked at the asset list and thought "You know what would be stupid, tanks playing golf". So we did that.

Best played in fullscreen mode, because I'm rubbish at scaling.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move Tank
  • Mouse - Aim and Shoot
  • Enter - Continue

Assets Used:

  • 3D Minigolf
  • Tanks
  • Nature
  • UI
